mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_code, e.emp_name, e.emp_sex, e.emp_phone, e.emp_email, e.dept_id, e.dept_code, d.dept_name, u.id as user_id, u.account, u.name as user_name, u.type as user_type, uc.code_name as user_type_name, u.phone, e.is_stop, COALESCE(ul.locked, 0) as locked, u.create_time as user_create_time, u.update_time as user_update_time, e.emp_type_id, ec.code_name as emp_type_name, e.bank_account, e.bank_name, e.photo FROM sys_emp e LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON e.emp_code = u.account LEFT JOIN sys_user_login ul ON u.id = ul.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_code ec ON ec.code_type = 'EMP_TYPE' AND ec.code_value = CAST(e.emp_type_id AS CHAR) AND ec.is_stop = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_code uc ON uc.code_type = 'USER_TYPE' AND uc.code_value = CAST(u.type AS CHAR) AND uc.is_stop = 0 ORDER BY e.emp_code ASC

SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_code, e.emp_name, e.emp_sex, e.emp_phone, e.emp_email, e.dept_id, e.dept_code, d.dept_name, u.id as user_id, u.account, u.name as user_name, u.type as user_type, uc.code_name as user_type_name, u.phone, e.is_stop, COALESCE(ul.locked, 0) as locked, u.create_time as user_create_time, u.update_time as user_update_time, e.emp_type_id, ec.code_name as emp_type_name, e.bank_account, e.bank_name, e.photo FROM sys_emp e LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON e.emp_code = u.account LEFT JOIN sys_user_login ul ON u.id = ul.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_code ec ON ec.code_type = 'EMP_TYPE' AND ec.code_value = CAST(e.emp_type_id AS CHAR) AND ec.is_stop = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_code uc ON uc.code_type = 'USER_TYPE' AND uc.code_value = CAST(u.type AS CHAR) AND uc.is_stop = 0 WHERE (e.emp_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR e.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY e.emp_code ASC

SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_code, e.emp_name, e.emp_sex, e.id_card, e.emp_birthday, e.create_time, e.update_time, e.emp_email, e.emp_phone, e.dept_id, e.dept_code, d.dept_name, e.create_user, e.is_stop, e.emp_type_id, ec.code_name as emp_type_name, u.type as user_type, uc.code_name as user_type_name, e.bank_account, e.bank_name, e.photo FROM sys_emp e LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON e.emp_code = u.account LEFT JOIN sys_code ec ON ec.code_type = 'EMP_TYPE' AND ec.code_value = CAST(e.emp_type_id AS CHAR) AND ec.is_stop = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_code uc ON uc.code_type = 'USER_TYPE' AND uc.code_value = CAST(u.type AS CHAR) AND uc.is_stop = 0 WHERE e.emp_code = #{empCode}
